long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share your Youtube Mixes!

Just go on any Youtube mix made for you, then "click mix to playlist"!
For example, try: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kyasYsJlF5g&list=RDkyasYsJlF5g&start_radio=1
Once page is loaded click the "Mix 2 Playlist" button.
Then click the "view playlist" button to view an unlisted playlist you can share the link to with others!

Note that the feature may stop working randomly; but it usually starts working again in a few days.
